FuncDef: This command creates an OSPF routing instance and then enters the associated context to configure the associated protocol parameters.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a unique integer that identifies a specific instance of a version of the OSPF protocol running in the router instance specified by the router ID. Values-1 to 31.
Specifies the OSPF router ID to be used with the associated OSPF instance. This IP address must be given a dot decimal notation format.
